name: pckd
description: Pckd - Not just a URL Shortener. Open Source, fully customizable

scripts.server-install: cd server && mv .env.example .env && npm run db-init && npm install
scripts.init: npm i -D nodemon concurrently && concurrently "npm run server-install" "npm run client-install"
scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development && concurrently "npm run dev-server" "npm run dev-client"
scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=production && cd server && npm start

author: Mohit Yadav
